problem:
Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.
advice: Hint: Focus on correctly storing the numbers that have been encountered while iterating through the array in the hashmap. Consider what data should be stored as the key-value pair in the hashmap to achieve the desired functionality of finding the indices of the two numbers that add up to the target value.
